scripts.tsc: tsc --outDir 'dist/server-temp' -p tsconfig.electron.json && rm -rf dist/server && mkdir dist/server && cp -r dist/server-temp/src/server/* dist/server && rm -rf dist/environments && mkdir dist/environments && cp -r dist/server-temp/src/environments/* dist/environments  && rm -rf dist/server-temp/
scripts.build-electron: rm -rf node_modules/camo/node_modules && ng build --base-href . && npm run tsc
scripts.start: npm run build-electron && electron main.js dev
scripts.prepare-package: npm run build-electron && rm -rf ./snap/parts && rm -rf ./snap/prime && rm -rf ./snap/stage && rm -rf ./snap/.snapcraft && rm -rf ./snap/*.snap
scripts.package-linux: npm run prepare-package && electron-packager . --overwrite --asar=true --platform=linux --arch=x64 --prune=true --out=release-builds --icon=src/assets/app-icons/png/1024x1024.png && cp -r unpackDir release-builds/Snippet-linux-x64
scripts.build-snap: npm run package-linux && cp ./snap/Snippet.desktop ./release-builds/Snippet-linux-x64 && cd ./snap && snapcraft
scripts.full-build-mac: npm run package-mac && npm run create-installer-mac
scripts.full-build-windows: npm run package-windows && npm run create-installer-windows
